verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> out of <S%H7851>Shittim<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> as <S%H7270>spies<s%> <S%H2791>secretly<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H7200>view<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>. And they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H802>house<s%> of a <S%H2181>harlot<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7343>Rahab<s%>, and lay <S%H7901>there<s%>.

And it was <S%H559>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H935>Behold<s%>, there came <S%H582>men<s%> in hither <S%H3915>to-night<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to search <S%H2658>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto <S%H7343>Rahab<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that are <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H935>thee<s%>, that are entered into thy <S%H1004>house<s%>; for they are <S%H935>come<s%> to search <S%H2658>out<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H6845>hid<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>; and she said, <S%H582>Yea<s%>, the men <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3045>me<s%>, but I knew not whence they <S%H370>were<s%>:

and it came to pass about the time of the <S%H5462>shutting<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, when it was <S%H2822>dark<s%>, that the <S%H582>men<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>; whither the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7291>not<s%>: pursue <S%H310>after<s%> them <S%H4118>quickly<s%>; for ye will overtake <S%H5381>them<s%>.

But she had brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1406>roof<s%>, and <S%H2934>hid<s%> them with the <S%H6086>stalks<s%> of <S%H6593>flax<s%>, which she had laid in <S%H6186>order<s%> upon the <S%H1406>roof<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> unto the <S%H4569>fords<s%>: and as soon as they that <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them were gone <S%H3318>out<s%>, they <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.
And before they were laid <S%H7901>down<s%>, she came <S%H5927>up<s%> unto them upon the <S%H1406>roof<s%>;

and she <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H776>land<s%>, and that the <S%H367>fear<s%> of you is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon <S%H3427>us<s%>, and that all the inhabitants of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4127>melt<s%> away before <S%H6440>you<s%>.

For we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> how <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>, when ye came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and what ye <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, that were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> and to <S%H5747>Og<s%>, whom ye utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%>.

And as soon as we had <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3824>it<s%>, our hearts did <S%H4549>melt<s%>, neither did there <S%H6965>remain<s%> any more <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in any <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H3068>you<s%>: for Jehovah your <S%H430>God<s%>, he is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, and on earth <S%H776>beneath<s%>.

Now <S%H7650>therefore<s%>, I pray you, swear unto me by <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H3588>since<s%> I have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with <S%H6213>you<s%>, that ye also will deal <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H226>token<s%>;

and that ye will save <S%H2421>alive<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and my <S%H517>mother<s%>, and my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and my <S%H269>sisters<s%>, and all that they <S%H5337>have<s%>, and will deliver our <S%H5315>lives<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5315>her<s%>, Our life for <S%H4191>yours<s%>, if ye <S%H5046>utter<s%> not this our <S%H1697>business<s%>; and it shall <S%H3068>be<s%>, when Jehovah <S%H5414>giveth<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%>, that we will <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and truly with <S%H571>thee<s%>.

Then she let them <S%H3381>down<s%> by a <S%H2256>cord<s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> the <S%H2474>window<s%>: for her <S%H1004>house<s%> was upon the <S%H7023>side<s%> of the <S%H2346>wall<s%>, and she <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>them<s%>, Get you to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, lest the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H6293>light<s%> upon <S%H2247>you<s%>; and hide yourselves there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, until the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> be <S%H7725>returned<s%>: and <S%H310>afterward<s%> may ye <S%H3212>go<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%>.
And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5355>her<s%>, We will be guiltless of this thine <S%H7621>oath<s%> which thou hast made us to <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

Behold <S%H935><s%>, when we come into the <S%H776>land<s%>, thou shalt <S%H7194>bind<s%> this <S%H8615>line<s%> of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H2339>thread<s%> in the <S%H2474>window<s%> which thou didst let us down <S%H3381>by<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H622>gather<s%> unto thee into the <S%H1004>house<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and thy <S%H517>mother<s%>, and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and all thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>household<s%>.

And it shall <S%H834>be<s%>, that whosoever shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of thy <S%H1004>house<s%> into the <S%H2351>street<s%>, his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and we shall be <S%H5355>guiltless<s%>: and whosoever shall be with thee in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on our <S%H7218>head<s%>, if any hand be upon <S%H3027>him<s%>.
But if thou <S%H5046>utter<s%> this our <S%H1697>business<s%>, then we shall be <S%H5355>guiltless<s%> of thine <S%H7621>oath<s%> which thou hast made us to <S%H7650>swear<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, According unto your <S%H1697>words<s%>, so be <S%H7971>it<s%>. And she sent them away, and they <S%H3212>departed<s%>: and she <S%H7194>bound<s%> the <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8615>line<s%> in the <S%H2474>window<s%>.

And they <S%H3212>went<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H3427>abode<s%> there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, until the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> were <S%H7725>returned<s%>: and the <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> them throughout all the <S%H1870>way<s%>, but found them <S%H4672>not<s%>.

Then the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H3381>descended<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>; and they <S%H5608>told<s%> him all that had befallen <S%H4672>them<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H3588>Truly<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%>; and moreover all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> do <S%H4127>melt<s%> away before <S%H6440>us<s%>.
